events.message: I filed a claim today because my vehicle was involved in a severe collision last night. The front bumper and headlights are badly damaged, and I need assistance to process repairs.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and photos of the car wreckage and damages documented in the claim.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to provide expert assistance and guide you through the next steps of the claims process.
We acknowledge receipt of your accident claim and will proceed with the required investigation promptly to ensure timely support.
To move forward, please submit your vehicle registration, photos of the damage, police report, and any medical bills related to the accident.
All requested documents including the police report, photos of the accident, and repair estimates have been submitted successfully for review.
We have initiated a detailed investigation to verify the circumstances of the collision and assess the extent of damages covered under your policy.
Our investigation is complete, confirming the damages and responsibility align with your claim. We are now moving to claim settlement.
A settlement proposal covering repair costs and rental reimbursement has been sent for your review and approval.
You provided positive feedback on the clear communication and timely updates throughout the claims process.
Your claim has been officially approved, confirming that the settlement amount will cover all necessary repair expenses.
The approved settlement payment has been issued and should be credited to your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Your auto accident claim has been closed successfully. We appreciate your cooperation throughout the entire process.
All records related to your auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance with company policies.
